meanings.definition: To strike someone forcefully with a closed fist.
meanings.sent1: He coldcocks the punching bag at the gym.
meanings.sent2: She coldcocks the door in frustration.
meanings.sent3: The boxer coldcocks the opponent, winning the match.
meanings.sent4: The storm coldcocks the trees, bending them to its will.
meanings.sent5: The superhero coldcocks the villain, saving the city from destruction.

meanings.definition: A sudden and unexpected blow to the head, typically rendering the recipient unconscious.
meanings.sent1: The boxer received a coldcocks during the match.
meanings.sent2: He fell to the ground after a coldcocks from behind.
meanings.sent3: The surprise party was a coldcocks to the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: The bad news hit him like a coldcocks, leaving him stunned.
meanings.sent5: The accident was a coldcocks to his memory, causing temporary amnesia.
